entry.title: CPP(ACO)TSP
entry.content:
Given a set of n nodes and distances for each pair of nodes, find aroundtrip of minimal total length visiting each node exactly once. The distance from node i to node j is the same as from node j to node i.

Berlin52 52 locations in Berlin (Germany)

->2024.10.25

  • route: intvector{3,2,1,4,5}3->2->1->4->55route(push_back)
  • TotalRouteLength()route

  • ijij/
  • DistancesMatrixTSP()
  • i->jj->iDistancesMatrixInformationMatrix0

solve()

  • ij
    • Select_NextCity()now(route)p(now,next)next
    • Calculate_TotalLengthj
    • Update_Informationroute
  • antsvector

*

Select_NextCity

  • **p_k(i,j)**

Calculate_TotalLength

solve()TSP(route)(route)

Update_Information

  • ROW
  • route(1/TotalRouteLength)

.tsp->

Berlin52->
